attributes.additional_details: Because what would be the point of cutting it down, children are already in school long enough and adding two weeks on autumn break makes no sense because why add it onto the autumn break when there already is a week.
attributes.background: Kids or people in general use the 6 week holiday to get out of the UK or to spend time away in different places cutting it down to 4 weeks now limits the time and places they’d get to go to. Let kids be kids, it’s also summer

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

The Government has not announced any plans to reduce the length of school summer holidays in England, so we're not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do.

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
